markdownRemark.html:
BP_Action_LaunchBomb

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Advanced/Actions/BP_Action_LaunchBomb

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_LaunchBomb : public BP_Action_C

Launches a bomb projectile at the specified end location in a physics based arc. Spawns a BP_Bomb actor for this purpose. By default used in BP_Ability_Bomb
